fèng
(literary) gift (of money etc) to a bereaved family; to contribute to funeral expenses
(литературный) подарок (денег и т. д.) семье покойного; внести свой вклад в расходы на похороны

賵字的基本解释

賵
fèng
见“赗”。

賵字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fèng］
［《廣韻》撫鳳切，去送，敷。］
“赗1”的繁体字。
(1)以车马等物助丧家送葬。
(2)送给丧家助葬的车马等物。

賵字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【貝字部】　賵； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1211第04
〔古文〕?【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?撫鳳切，音麷。【說文】贈死者。【儀禮·旣夕註】賵，所以助主人送葬也。【春秋·隱元年】天王使宰咺來歸惠公仲子之賵。【註】賵，助喪之物。仲子，惠公妾也。【公羊傳】車馬曰賵，貨財曰賻。【註】賵猶覆也，賻猶助也，皆助生送死之禮。【穀梁傳·隱三年】歸死者曰賵，歸生者曰賻。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［fèng］
["Guangyun" Fufeng cut, sent and applied. ]
"赗1" in traditional characters.
(1) Use chariots and horses to assist funerals in funerals.
(2) Chariots, horses, and other things for funerals.
赗
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Youth Collection】【Beijing Department】　赗; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 1211 Page 04
[Ancient text]? [Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Fufeng cut, sound noodles. 【Said the text】Gift to the deceased. 【Ritual·Xi Xi Note】赗, so help the owner to go to the funeral. [Spring and Autumn · Yin First Year] The king sent Zai Ao to return to Hui Gong Zhongzi. 【Note】赗, a funeral aid. Zhongzi, Hui Gong concubine too. [The Story of Gongyang] Chariots and horses are called 赗, goods and wealth are called 赙. 【Note】Bao is still alive, and Qiu is still a help, both of which are gifts for life and death. [Guliang Chuan·Hidden Three Years] The one who returns to the dead is called Feng, and the one who returns to life is called Feng.
